title: At Least 30 Dead After Weeks of Heavy Snowfall in Japan
summary_full: Snowfall in parts of Japan has also left about 200 people injured. One city recorded 72 inches of snow, the highest in almost 40 years.
summary_public: Snowfall in parts of Japan has also left about 200 people injured. One city recorded 72 inches of snow, the highest in almost 40 years.
